verses.verse: Then <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H6950>assembled<s%> the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and all the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribes<s%>, the <S%H5387>chief<s%> of the <S%H1>fathers<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, unto <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, that they might bring <S%H5927>up<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> out of the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%>, which is <S%H6726>Zion<s%>.

And all the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6950>assembled<s%> themselves unto <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> at the <S%H2282>feast<s%> in the <S%H3391>month<s%> <S%H388>Ethanim<s%>, which is the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%>.
And all the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H935>came<s%>, and the <S%H3548>priests<s%> took <S%H5375>up<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%>.

And they brought <S%H5927>up<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%>, and all the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H3627>vessels<s%> that were in the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%>, even those did the <S%H3548>priests<s%> and the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> bring <S%H5927>up<s%>.

And <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%>, and all the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, that were <S%H3259>assembled<s%> unto him, were with him <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%>, <S%H2076>sacrificing<s%> <S%H6629>sheep<s%> and <S%H1241>oxen<s%>, that could not be <S%H5608>told<s%> nor <S%H4487>numbered<s%> for <S%H7230>multitude<s%>.

And the <S%H3548>priests<s%> brought <S%H935>in<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> unto his <S%H4725>place<s%>, into the <S%H1687>oracle<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%>, to the <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>holy<s%> place, even under the <S%H3671>wings<s%> of the <S%H3742>cherubims<s%>.

For the <S%H3742>cherubims<s%> spread <S%H6566>forth<s%> their two <S%H3671>wings<s%> over the <S%H4725>place<s%> of the <S%H727>ark<s%>, and the <S%H3742>cherubims<s%> <S%H5526>covered<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> and the <S%H905>staves<s%> thereof <S%H4605>above<s%>.

And they drew <S%H748>out<s%> the <S%H905>staves<s%>, that the <S%H7218>ends<s%> of the <S%H905>staves<s%> were seen <S%H7200>out<s%> in the <S%H6944>holy<s%> place <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H1687>oracle<s%>, and they were not <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H2351>without<s%>: and there they are unto this <S%H3117>day<s%>.

There was nothing in the <S%H727>ark<s%> <S%H7535>save<s%> the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3871>tables<s%> of <S%H68>stone<s%>, which <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H3240>put<s%> there at <S%H2722>Horeb<s%>, when the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H3772>made<s%> a covenant with the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, when they came <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>.

And it came to pass, when the <S%H3548>priests<s%> were come <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H6944>holy<s%> place, that the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> <S%H4390>filled<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>,

So that the <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H3201>could<s%> not <S%H5975>stand<s%> to <S%H8334>minister<s%> <S%H6440>because<s%> of the <S%H6051>cloud<s%>: for the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had <S%H4390>filled<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.
¶ Then <S%H559>spake<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%>, The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> that he would <S%H7931>dwell<s%> in the thick <S%H6205>darkness<s%>.
I have <S%H1129>surely<s%> <S%H1129>built<s%> thee an <S%H1004>house<s%> to dwell <S%H2073>in<s%>, a settled <S%H4349>place<s%> for thee to abide <S%H3427>in<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%>.

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H5437>turned<s%> his <S%H6440>face<s%> <S%H5437>about<s%>, and <S%H1288>blessed<s%> all the <S%H6951>congregation<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: (and all the <S%H6951>congregation<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%>;)

And he <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H1288>Blessed<s%> be the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, which <S%H1696>spake<s%> with his <S%H6310>mouth<s%> unto <S%H1732>David<s%> my <S%H1>father<s%>, and hath with his <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H4390>fulfilled<s%> it, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

Since the <S%H3117>day<s%> that I brought <S%H3318>forth<s%> my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, I <S%H977>chose<s%> no <S%H5892>city<s%> out of all the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to <S%H1129>build<s%> an <S%H1004>house<s%>, that my <S%H8034>name<s%> might be therein; but I <S%H977>chose<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> to be over my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And it was in the <S%H3824>heart<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> my <S%H1>father<s%> to <S%H1129>build<s%> an <S%H1004>house<s%> for the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H1732>David<s%> my <S%H1>father<s%>, <S%H3282%H834>Whereas<s%> it was in thine <S%H3824>heart<s%> to <S%H1129>build<s%> an <S%H1004>house<s%> unto my <S%H8034>name<s%>, thou didst <S%H2895>well<s%> that it was in thine <S%H3824>heart<s%>.

<S%H7535>Nevertheless<s%> thou shalt not <S%H1129>build<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%>; but thy <S%H1121>son<s%> that shall come forth <S%H3318>out<s%> of thy <S%H2504>loins<s%>, he shall <S%H1129>build<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> unto my <S%H8034>name<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H6965>performed<s%> his <S%H1697>word<s%> that he <S%H1696>spake<s%>, and I am risen <S%H6965>up<s%> in the room of <S%H1732>David<s%> my <S%H1>father<s%>, and <S%H3427>sit<s%> on the <S%H3678>throne<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>promised<s%>, and have <S%H1129>built<s%> an <S%H1004>house<s%> for the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And I have <S%H7760>set<s%> there a <S%H4725>place<s%> for the <S%H727>ark<s%>, wherein is the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, which he <S%H3772>made<s%> with our <S%H1>fathers<s%>, when he brought them <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>.

¶ And <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> in the presence <S%H5048>of<s%> all the <S%H6951>congregation<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and spread <S%H6566>forth<s%> his <S%H3709>hands<s%> toward <S%H8064>heaven<s%>:

And he <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, there is no <S%H430>God<s%> like thee, in <S%H8064>heaven<s%> <S%H4605>above<s%>, or on <S%H776>earth<s%> beneath, who <S%H8104>keepest<s%> <S%H1285>covenant<s%> and <S%H2617>mercy<s%> with thy <S%H5650>servants<s%> that <S%H1980>walk<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> thee with all their <S%H3820>heart<s%>:

Who hast <S%H8104>kept<s%> with thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> my <S%H1>father<s%> that thou <S%H1696>promisedst<s%> him: thou <S%H1696>spakest<s%> also with thy <S%H6310>mouth<s%>, and hast <S%H4390>fulfilled<s%> it with thine <S%H3027>hand<s%>, as it is this <S%H3117>day<s%>.

Therefore now, <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H8104>keep<s%> with thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> my <S%H1>father<s%> that thou <S%H1696>promisedst<s%> him, <S%H559>saying<s%>, There shall not <S%H3772>fail<s%> thee a <S%H376>man<s%> in my <S%H6440>sight<s%> to <S%H3427>sit<s%> on the <S%H3678>throne<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; <S%H7535>so<s%> that thy <S%H1121>children<s%> take <S%H8104>heed<s%> to their <S%H1870>way<s%>, that they <S%H3212>walk<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me as thou hast <S%H1980>walked<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me.

And now, O <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, let thy <S%H1697>word<s%>, I pray thee, be <S%H539>verified<s%>, which thou <S%H1696>spakest<s%> unto thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> my <S%H1>father<s%>.

But will <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H552>indeed<s%> <S%H3427>dwell<s%> on the <S%H776>earth<s%>? behold, the <S%H8064>heaven<s%> and <S%H8064>heaven<s%> of <S%H8064>heavens<s%> cannot <S%H3557>contain<s%> thee; how much <S%H637>less<s%> this <S%H1004>house<s%> that I have <S%H1129>builded<s%>?

Yet have thou <S%H6437>respect<s%> unto the <S%H8605>prayer<s%> of thy <S%H5650>servant<s%>, and to his <S%H8467>supplication<s%>, O <S%H3068>LORD<s%> my <S%H430>God<s%>, to <S%H8085>hearken<s%> unto the <S%H7440>cry<s%> and to the <S%H8605>prayer<s%>, which thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H6419>prayeth<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> thee to <S%H3117>day<s%>:

That thine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> may be <S%H6605>open<s%> toward this <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H3915>night<s%> and <S%H3117>day<s%>, even toward the <S%H4725>place<s%> of which thou hast <S%H559>said<s%>, My <S%H8034>name<s%> shall be there: that thou mayest <S%H8085>hearken<s%> unto the <S%H8605>prayer<s%> which thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> shall <S%H6419>make<s%> toward this <S%H4725>place<s%>.

And <S%H8085>hearken<s%> thou to the <S%H8467>supplication<s%> of thy <S%H5650>servant<s%>, and of thy <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, when they shall <S%H6419>pray<s%> toward this <S%H4725>place<s%>: and <S%H8085>hear<s%> thou in <S%H8064>heaven<s%> thy <S%H3427>dwelling<s%> <S%H4725>place<s%>: and when thou <S%H8085>hearest<s%>, <S%H5545>forgive<s%>.

¶ If any <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H2398>trespass<s%> against his <S%H7453>neighbour<s%>, and an <S%H423>oath<s%> be <S%H5375>laid<s%> upon him to cause him to <S%H422>swear<s%>, and the <S%H423>oath<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> thine <S%H4196>altar<s%> in this <S%H1004>house<s%>:

Then <S%H8085>hear<s%> thou in <S%H8064>heaven<s%>, and <S%H6213>do<s%>, and <S%H8199>judge<s%> thy <S%H5650>servants<s%>, <S%H7561>condemning<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked<s%>, to <S%H5414>bring<s%> his <S%H1870>way<s%> upon his <S%H7218>head<s%>; and <S%H6663>justifying<s%> the <S%H6662>righteous<s%>, to <S%H5414>give<s%> him according to his <S%H6666>righteousness<s%>.

¶ When thy <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> be smitten <S%H5062>down<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H341>enemy<s%>, because they have <S%H2398>sinned<s%> against thee, and shall turn <S%H7725>again<s%> to thee, and <S%H3034>confess<s%> thy <S%H8034>name<s%>, and <S%H6419>pray<s%>, and make <S%H2603>supplication<s%> unto thee in this <S%H1004>house<s%>:

Then <S%H8085>hear<s%> thou in <S%H8064>heaven<s%>, and <S%H5545>forgive<s%> the <S%H2403>sin<s%> of thy <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and bring them <S%H7725>again<s%> unto the <S%H127>land<s%> which thou <S%H5414>gavest<s%> unto their <S%H1>fathers<s%>.

¶ When <S%H8064>heaven<s%> is shut <S%H6113>up<s%>, and there is no <S%H4306>rain<s%>, because they have <S%H2398>sinned<s%> against thee; if they <S%H6419>pray<s%> toward this <S%H4725>place<s%>, and <S%H3034>confess<s%> thy <S%H8034>name<s%>, and <S%H7725>turn<s%> from their <S%H2403>sin<s%>, when thou <S%H6031>afflictest<s%> them:

Then <S%H8085>hear<s%> thou in <S%H8064>heaven<s%>, and <S%H5545>forgive<s%> the <S%H2403>sin<s%> of thy <S%H5650>servants<s%>, and of thy <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, that thou <S%H3384>teach<s%> them the <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H1870>way<s%> wherein they should <S%H3212>walk<s%>, and <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H4306>rain<s%> upon thy <S%H776>land<s%>, which thou hast <S%H5414>given<s%> to thy <S%H5971>people<s%> for an <S%H5159>inheritance<s%>.

¶ If there be in the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H7458>famine<s%>, if there be <S%H1698>pestilence<s%>, <S%H7711>blasting<s%>, <S%H3420>mildew<s%>, <S%H697>locust<s%>, or if there be <S%H2625>caterpiller<s%>; if their <S%H341>enemy<s%> <S%H6887>besiege<s%> them in the <S%H776>land<s%> of their <S%H8179>cities<s%>; whatsoever <S%H5061>plague<s%>, whatsoever <S%H4245>sickness<s%> there be;

What <S%H8605>prayer<s%> and <S%H8467>supplication<s%> soever be made by any <S%H120>man<s%>, or by all thy <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, which shall <S%H3045>know<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> the <S%H5061>plague<s%> of his own <S%H3824>heart<s%>, and spread <S%H6566>forth<s%> his <S%H3709>hands<s%> toward this <S%H1004>house<s%>:

Then <S%H8085>hear<s%> thou in <S%H8064>heaven<s%> thy <S%H3427>dwelling<s%> <S%H4349>place<s%>, and <S%H5545>forgive<s%>, and <S%H6213>do<s%>, and <S%H5414>give<s%> to every <S%H376>man<s%> according to his <S%H1870>ways<s%>, whose <S%H3824>heart<s%> thou <S%H3045>knowest<s%>; (for thou, even thou only, <S%H3045>knowest<s%> the <S%H3824>hearts<s%> of all the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H120>men<s%>;)
That they may <S%H3372>fear<s%> thee all the <S%H3117>days<s%> that they <S%H2416>live<s%> <S%H6440>in<s%> the <S%H127>land<s%> which thou <S%H5414>gavest<s%> unto our <S%H1>fathers<s%>.

Moreover concerning a <S%H5237>stranger<s%>, that is not of thy <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, but cometh <S%H935>out<s%> of a <S%H7350>far<s%> <S%H776>country<s%> <S%H4616>for<s%> thy <S%H8034>name's<s%> sake;

(For they shall <S%H8085>hear<s%> of thy <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H8034>name<s%>, and of thy <S%H2389>strong<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and of thy stretched <S%H5186>out<s%> <S%H2220>arm<s%>;) when he shall <S%H935>come<s%> and <S%H6419>pray<s%> toward this <S%H1004>house<s%>;

<S%H8085>Hear<s%> thou in <S%H8064>heaven<s%> thy <S%H3427>dwelling<s%> <S%H4349>place<s%>, and <S%H6213>do<s%> according to all that the <S%H5237>stranger<s%> <S%H7121>calleth<s%> to thee for: that all <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> may <S%H3045>know<s%> thy <S%H8034>name<s%>, to <S%H3372>fear<s%> thee, as do thy <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; and that they may <S%H3045>know<s%> that this <S%H1004>house<s%>, which I have <S%H1129>builded<s%>, is <S%H7121>called<s%> by thy <S%H8034>name<s%>.

¶ If thy <S%H5971>people<s%> go <S%H3318>out<s%> to <S%H4421>battle<s%> against their <S%H341>enemy<s%>, <S%H1870>whithersoever<s%> thou shalt <S%H7971>send<s%> them, and shall <S%H6419>pray<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1870>toward<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> which thou hast <S%H977>chosen<s%>, and toward the <S%H1004>house<s%> that I have <S%H1129>built<s%> for thy <S%H8034>name<s%>:
Then <S%H8085>hear<s%> thou in <S%H8064>heaven<s%> their <S%H8605>prayer<s%> and their <S%H8467>supplication<s%>, and <S%H6213>maintain<s%> their <S%H4941>cause<s%>.

If they <S%H2398>sin<s%> against thee, (for there is no <S%H120>man<s%> that <S%H2398>sinneth<s%> not,) and thou be <S%H599>angry<s%> with them, and <S%H5414>deliver<s%> them to the <S%H341>enemy<s%>, so that they carry them <S%H7617>away<s%> <S%H7617>captives<s%> <S%H6440>unto<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H341>enemy<s%>, <S%H7350>far<s%> or <S%H7138>near<s%>;

Yet if they shall <S%H7725>bethink<s%> themselves in the <S%H776>land<s%> whither they were carried <S%H7617>captives<s%>, and <S%H7725%H3820>repent<s%>, and make <S%H2603>supplication<s%> unto thee in the <S%H776>land<s%> of them that carried them <S%H7617>captives<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, We have <S%H2398>sinned<s%>, and have done <S%H5753>perversely<s%>, we have committed <S%H7561>wickedness<s%>;

And so <S%H7725>return<s%> unto thee with all their <S%H3824>heart<s%>, and with all their <S%H5315>soul<s%>, in the <S%H776>land<s%> of their <S%H341>enemies<s%>, which led them away <S%H7617>captive<s%>, and <S%H6419>pray<s%> unto thee <S%H1870>toward<s%> their <S%H776>land<s%>, which thou <S%H5414>gavest<s%> unto their <S%H1>fathers<s%>, the <S%H5892>city<s%> which thou hast <S%H977>chosen<s%>, and the <S%H1004>house<s%> which I have <S%H1129>built<s%> for thy <S%H8034>name<s%>:

For they be thy <S%H5971>people<s%>, and thine <S%H5159>inheritance<s%>, which thou broughtest <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, from the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H3564>furnace<s%> of <S%H1270>iron<s%>:

That thine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> may be <S%H6605>open<s%> unto the <S%H8467>supplication<s%> of thy <S%H5650>servant<s%>, and unto the <S%H8467>supplication<s%> of thy <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, to <S%H8085>hearken<s%> unto them in all that they <S%H7121>call<s%> for unto thee.

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> be with us, as he was with our <S%H1>fathers<s%>: let him not <S%H5800>leave<s%> us, nor <S%H5203>forsake<s%> us:
